mapper.insert: insert into student(s_name, s_school, s_grade, s_birth, s_gender, s_phone, s_family, s_relation, s_family_phone1, s_family_phone2, s_sibling, reg_date, first_date, s_filename) values(#{s_name}, #{s_school}, #{s_grade}, #{s_birth}, #{s_gender}, #{s_phone}, #{s_family}, #{s_relation}, #{s_family_phone1}, #{s_family_phone2}, #{s_sibling}, #{reg_date}, #{first_date}, #{s_filename})
mapper.select: select s_id, s_name from student where s_name=#{s_name}
